yaml.title: Resources
yaml.subtitle: My favorite references for ecology, GIS, R, Python, and more.

markdown.markdown:
Use the filter/search options below to explore my collated resources.

*Example Search Terms: "R", "book", "GIS"*

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv")

data_cat <- data %>% pull(Category)

data_type <- data %>% pull(Type)


```



```{r}
library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv")

reactable(
  data,
  wrap = TRUE,
  resizable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 20,
  paginationType = "simple",
  showPageInfo = FALSE,
  minRows = 1,
  elementId = "tbl",
  columns = list(
    Name = colDef(
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Description <- data$Description[index]
        Description <- if (!is.na(Description)) Description else "Unknown"
        div(
          div(style = "font-weight: 600", value),
          div(style = "font-size: 0.75rem", Description)
          
        )
      }, width = 600
    ),
    Description = colDef(show = FALSE),
    Link = colDef(cell = function(value) {
      tags$a(href = value, target = "_blank", "Link")
    }
    )
  )
)
```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
## Resource Database

Use the filter/search options below to explore my collated resources.

*Example Search Terms: "R", "book", "GIS"*

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv")

data_cat <- data %>% pull(Category)

data_type <- data %>% pull(Type)


```



```{r}
library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv")

reactable(
  data,
  wrap = TRUE,
  resizable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 20,
  paginationType = "simple",
  showPageInfo = FALSE,
  minRows = 1,
  elementId = "tbl",
  columns = list(
    Name = colDef(
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Description <- data$Description[index]
        Description <- if (!is.na(Description)) Description else "Unknown"
        div(
          div(style = "font-weight: 600", value),
          div(style = "font-size: 0.75rem", Description)
          
        )
      }, width = 600
    ),
    Description = colDef(show = FALSE),
    Link = colDef(cell = function(value) {
      tags$a(href = value, target = "_blank", "Link")
    }
    )
  )
)
```
